author: Paul Glicklin
comment: Temperature degrees are shown in ridiculous numbers. 500's for F, 200's for C. Can you fix??

author: John Columbia
comment: Great watch but my temp is all jacked up on the LG G watch R. Please fix.

author: Richard Gaffney
comment: Really enjoy this watch face. Very cool to show friends how much info available.
title: Very cool

author: mishu een
comment: In ambient mode the notifications are impossible to read since the background is not opaque.   Color change or presets??
title: Opaque in ambient mode

author: Joel Contreras
comment: Just displays the time with a bunch of squares with no weather. Tried automatic and manually with no results. Refreshing didn't work either. Disappointed!

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
I've updated the app.Could you please check the latest version?
If you have a question,please feel free to contact our email address.
Thank you.

title: No weather

author: Henry Jones
comment: Like the watch face a lot. Worked well but stopped showing any info except days and time. The day after I wrote the review an update was issued that solved the problem. Very impressed.
title: Dissapointed

author: Rebecca N
comment: Worked fine for a while. But since yesterday it does not display any weather information.
title: None of your watch faces are able to display weather

author: Neil Young
comment: Needs the ability to set watch face colour to any desirable colour . then I'd rate 5 star and recommend to friends
title: Room for improvement

author: keith norton
comment: Love the watch face 1 of the best out there.  Only complaint is I wish the barometric pressure was in mbar  I am using the lg g watch r.
title: Keith

author: Ilias K
comment: i really like this one, but same like the other one from same vendor, when the watch loses connection and reconnects, the weather data is not restored

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank  you for your feedback.
I've emailed to you,would you please check.
Thank you.

title: half functionality

author: Matt Munro
comment: I like this a lot, but I really don't get/understand some of the settings about "face drawing mode, color filter black and white etc..." its just confusing. I want blue to be as bright as the default, overly saturated green, but for the life of me, I can't get it! You can toggle all you want, but if you're not a watch face developer, ya might not get it the way you want/expected...
title: Kinda difficult...

author: Greg Bullock
comment: Latest version drains battery very heavily and Android Wear 5.1.  Otherwise 5*
title: Great but problem with recent update

author: Wayne Piekarski
comment: This is my favorite watch face, I use it with a black background and red text. It looks amazing on my black LG G Watch R.
title: My favorite watch face

author: Raul Arevalo
comment: Weather displayed does not match actual weather on my phone or anywhere near what the weather actually is in my area! Everything else is awesome. Great design but won't buy any more until they fix the inaccurate weather.

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback and contacting our email address.
Just replied to you, thank you.

title: Inaccurate weather

author: Ahmad Al-Khater
comment: Nice

author: jason godoy
comment: Love it
title: Nice face

author: JOSEPH LIM
comment: Nice display with relatively clear info. However the font should be change for a softer look.
title: Love the VERY informative display

author: Steven Teversham
comment: Excellent design and fab
title: Watch

author: Devin Gonzales
comment: Need black mode option in all colors always on. Expecially for the LG G WATCH R to avoid screen burn-in on the P-OLED screen
title: Need black mode option

author: Rico Young
comment: Does not show any info on weather, wind, barometer at all. Location n gps all turned on my phone. only time n date are displayed ... disappointed.
title: Not working

author: Ilian Dimitrov
comment: Very nice app and watch face and fast replay on problems
title: Nice work

author: Pekka Savolainen
comment: 24H time format not working in weather data and solar events. I'm sure that's easily fixed. Good work!
title: Nice but...

author: Robert Bridle
comment: Provides a really nice alternative watch face to the ones provided by lg
title: Works great with lg r

author: Miles Arima
comment: Not happy with app

author: Ged Attwood
comment: Like the watch face but has crashed a good few times, option to have it in inverted mode all the time with different brightness in dimmed mode would be good.
title: It's OK

author: Evelien Van Dingenen
comment: Love it but I'd like to use the black and white constantly, but brighter in normal than in dimmed mode. Can't seem to get that done.
title: Love it

author: Eddie a.k.a b4d5h0t
comment: Loving your work! My favourite watchface by far, It looks great in normal and dimmed mode, shows useful information and has lots of brightness and colour options to fine tune style and battery life. Helpful developer who is constantly improving and updating his work (thanks for all the updates and improvements). Highly Recommended!

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content: Thank you for your feedback.Could you please send us your face's picture.I'd like to fix.

title: Best yet!....Awesome!

author: Liviu Popa
comment: The developer support is amazing.  Now the app it's just sublime :). Everything works as expected.  GOOD JOB. I just wish more developers will be like you.

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content: Thank you for your feedback.Could you please send us your face's picture.I'd like to fix.

title: 6 stars :)

author: Asif Khan
comment: How amazing is it that new watch faces can be installed in 10seconds! I love this layout, imo you can't have too much information on display and this face really goes for it! absolutely love it!
title: wonderful!

author: Carl Graser
comment: I don't see  current temperature

comment: Green only
title: One color
